0: this is a good hotel to host a business conference 200 people or less but it is not an above average hotel for pleasure
When staying at any Hilton venue i m expecting a respectful solution oriented high quality service
I was at this hotel for a business event
Good service very clean with nice ballrooms
conference rooms are well located withing the hotel and staff very helpful and acomodating
I was there for a meeting rooms were nice and open
Attended a holiday event at Toronto Hilton Airport
Hilton did a great job with the events elegance and the servers were quick and pleasant
Food was great and venue was great
I flew in the night before for a morning meeting and out the next day
1: We were there for a conference so we did not get to choose the hotel ourselves
Trip for Jehovahs Witnesses international convention 2019
Whether you ’re doing an overnight from the airport or a week long conference this hotel is going to please
2: The conference area carpets leave obvious lint on every bag and on the pant legs and socks of our conference participants
Many areas in the hotel constantly smell like engine exhaust for example the basement conference area and the second level conference rooms
There was a conference in the hotel and everyone seemed to use that floor for their own personal call space
2 people from our company stayed at the Hilton and booked a meeting room for a 2 hour meeting
I was told no rooms were available for the conference that I was attending
Upon arrival at the hotel they were sold out as a large number of people had walked in for some sort of company function
